The screen caps aren't dead links, it's just TPB is blocked as a referrer. You can use addons to hide your referrer and then the links work fine in Firefox. I use RefControl.

@aradiel is correct the add-on can be used to hide or forge the referrer as TPB and then it works fine

Install the add-on
Add a new site from RefControl options 
Copy and Paste the link as "imageshack.us"
and then select Forge
then ur done! Links work fine then!

to fix the out of sync, 0,8s in VLC
of sunc and ter is a second with sum russian sound oterwise its good thx for the up loade

To fix the audio use vlc media player
then go to "tools" 
then select "Track syncronization"
in that increse the option "Advance the audio over video from 0 to 0.800 s"
this should fix the mismatched audio in the second half..
other than this 
A-6

M-8

@ 32:04 audio drops to about 3 seconds behind video

Visual quality is good for R5, audio issue is awkward but movie is still good

**********HOW TO FIX AUDIO*************

After 32:04 the audio goes out of sync.
To fix the audio using VLC media player
then go to "tools"
then select "Track syncronization"
in that increase the option "Advance the audio over video from 0 to 0.800 s"
this should fix the mismatched audio in the second half.

Big thanks to Senesence for finding this out!!!!!!!

Use convertXtodvd, load file in convertXtodvd, look for source file in the window where the movie is loaded. There you can offset the the video to match the audio. 

I am unsure how many milliseconds is needed to burn this vid as I have yet to download this video.

I think convertXtodvd says 10 is 30 seconds or something, look on there site to see what their offset ratio is to get a idea of how many ms's is needed.
